jobs.title: Co-founder and CMO of Skillsuper®
jobs.description:
Our team  is working on building a platform to make a unique social impact and solve one of the most genuine threats to economic progress that will cost the global economy over than $8 trillion in the next decade. We are now looking for a Chief Marketing Officer/Co-founder to help take the business from MVP to ultimately Unicorn status. If you are ambitious, interested in being part of the future of life science industry and in solving a real problem for millions – this could be perfect for you!

About Skillsuper:
Skillsuper® is  the world's first skills platform where graduates and researchers learn all on-demand life science skills to secure the best jobs and scholarships. Skillsuper® provides online skills programs, courses and tools for people who are working in the life science industry to be qualified to shape the global innovation map and to close the global skills gap. Technology  and intellectual property of Skillsuper®  have been protected under “U.S patents pending” and a registered trademark.

The company is currently in the pre-seed stage. It has been built MVP and is ready for a private beta launch.

What are we looking for?
We are looking for an entrepreneurial CMO / Co-founder who believes in the idea/concept of Skillsuper® and shares our passion. More specifically, we are currently looking for a Head of Marketing and Sales "CMO" to join our managing team. The ideal candidate is someone with an entrepreneurial spirit, that understands the dynamics of working for an early-stage startup, has a background in business development, preferentially startup founding and VC fundraising and who is willing to take charge and be responsible for all marketing efforts of the company. 

Tasks & Responsibilities:
-	Developing & executing sales & marketing strategies.
-	Be key in managing investor relations and acquiring new investors, customers,
-	Develop long and short-term strategies and tactics for growth
-	Help develop brand awareness and messaging to attract and retain users and partners
-	Create content and manage  social media communication
-	Channel development & management.
-	Marketing and sales team building & management.
Education: Any undergraduate degree or higher.


What do we offer?
•	Real mission: the challenge to re-shape a multi-billion-dollar market with us. 
•	Opportunity to gain experience in marketing and build a personal network.
•	Flexible working hours and remote working at the first stage
•	Possibility for an equity stake in my company 
•	A ton of learning and even more challenges
We would like the candidate to be able to start right away on a part-time (remotely) consultant basis and be available to work full-time once we complete our latest funding round.  The job includes a significant equity package, salary, and health care benefits that will be added when you start full-time. Whilst we can not pay a salary immediately, commissions are payable, as well as a large equity stake up for grabs for the right person. Sounds interesting? Get in touch!
